subject: Re: Staff messages on People page
preview: Hi Lucy, Sure, please see attached. We can see that the emails are being sent from our end, so yes, it would be great to cross check and make sure the team are receiving. These are from since the la

full_threads.body:
Hi Lucy, 

Sure, please see attached. We can see that the emails are being sent from our end, so yes, it would be great to cross check and make sure the team are receiving. 

These are from since the launch of the new site - AU.

Hi Heath,

Still have this in my inbox as something to follow up - how have we been going with this and did you want me to run anymore tests to check if this is working?

In the meantime, are you able to please download the contact-us form/message results in the back end of the website so that I can share these with the customer care in case there are still some that aren't coming through?

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi,

Have attached the tests that came through (I tested on the Global and AU site and also on different fields). I'd like to add something to the form/submission that includes the location they are enquiring about so that it's clearer for the team but it now looks like the requests from the global site are coming through but not the AU site?

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy and Nathaniel,

Would you mind doing another couple of tests now? We have completed the setup of the new email sending setup.

Great - thanks for following this up!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy,

Ok thanks for checking. The solution we put in place doesn't seem to like the multisite setup. We are going to tackle this another way. I have just asked Vinetek to update some records at their end. I'll keep you updated.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
HI Heath,

Unfortunately we're still having problems - I just recently submitted a few tests on the 'contact us' page. On the AU site these all came through, but none came through when submitted on the global site.

These are also some inconsistencies with where these are coming through (some to hello and some to customercare.au - that could be my direction but honestly have forgotten which is going where!)

I've attached 3 example emails that DID come through. Could you take a look at this? Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

Good I managed to sort it out from our end. The webservers IP address appears to have been blocked for sending emails to your team, so I have just implemented a solution to get around it.

I have asked Nathaniel to confirm if the responses are coming through to their respective inboxes.

Hi nathaniel.bamikefa@acoufelt.com and heath@wolfiq.com.au

How did you go with working through this issue? Did we resolve this?

Thanks

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Lucy,

Will do.

Thanks
